headline.main: EDITH WHARTON, 75, IS DEAD IN FRANCE; Novelist Wrote 'Ethan Frome,' 'The Age of Innocence' and 36 Other Books

abstract: Death, por; funeral plans; career; tributes
snippet: Edith Wharton, American novelist, died yesterday afternoon at her villa, Pavilion Colombes, near Saint Brice, Seine-etOise. She had been In fairly good health until she suffered an apoplectic stroke early yesterday morning and did not recover cons...

byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES
